product_name: Ocean Lineage Paddleboard Rail Saver Tape - Dual 8' x 3" Strips
long_description: Ideal for touring boards with wide rails, the Ocean Lineage Paddleboard Rail Saver Tape is a great way to protect and preserve your paddleboard from cosmetic damage. Prevents chipping damage to boards from paddle strikes and accidental drops. Comes with 2 clear strips that measure 8 ft. x 3 in.
short_description: Ideal for touring boards with wide rails, the Ocean Lineage Paddleboard Rail Saver Tape is a great way to protect and preserve your paddleboard from cosmetic damage.
